name: Robobot 2
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam (Update a Game).
Robobot 2 is the successor to Robobot, the first game I ever created (over eight years ago). For the theme, I decided to update the game and show what progress I've made as a game developer. Can you make it to the final boss and win? All assets were created by me. I don't plan on updating this specific version, but if you guys like the idea I may try to flesh it out into a proper sequel/game. I've also included the original Robobot for comparison.

Thanks for playing!

Controls: W/S to move up and down, SPACE to shoot lasers.
